Billy Ko, President - Investment Club at Singapore Institute Of TechnologyLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 31 Mar 2019Hi there! If you're a student and your school has Bloomberg terminals, you're able to obtain the certificate FOC. However, do note that the accreditation is only valid for a year so you have to constantly re-accreditate yourself if you're keen. I wouldn't say its like the star on the Christmas tree of your resume, but it can certainly act as an ornament on the Christmas tree. Increases your knowledge on financial concepts too!0 comments2
